pageDescription: Stay up to date with all active and upcoming SWTOR events. Tips, dates, and rewards.

pageEvents.name: Rakghoul Resurgence
pageEvents.rewards: Rakghoul DNA Canisters, Exclusive titles, Armor sets, Pets
pageEvents.desc: A Rakghoul plague spreads across the galaxy! Travel to the affected planet, complete daily missions, and earn exclusive event rewards.
tips: Complete daily missions for DNA Canisters
The world boss drops rare items

pageEvents.name: Bounty Contract Week
pageEvents.desc: Accept hunting contracts and track dangerous targets across various planets. Available monthly.
tips: Kingpin contracts become available after completing 5 normal contracts
BBA reputation grants access to exclusive items

pageEvents.name: Swoop Rally
pageEvents.desc: Swoop bike races on Dantooine, Onderon, and other planets! Earn tokens to trade for rewards.
tips: Daily and weekly quests give more tokens
Exclusive mounts are only available during the event

pageEvents.name: Double XP Event
pageEvents.desc: Double experience in all game activities. Perfect for leveling alts and completing class stories.
tips: Great time to level alts to max
Flashpoints give massive XP with the bonus

pageEvents.name: Pirate Incursion
pageEvents.desc: Pirates invade Dantooine! Defend the colony and complete missions for themed rewards.
tips: The event takes place on Dantooine
Complete all dailies to maximize rewards

pageEvents.name: Feast of Prosperity
pageEvents.desc: The great Hutt feast! Cooking challenges, food fights, and culinary competitions across the galaxy.
